He also mentioned that Sergey Brin will focus on ''the order of three big initiatives.'' Eric Schmidt didn't elaborate. Turning to competition, Eric Schmidt said he was perplexed by the Facebook obsession because the facts don't support it.''[ Facebook] has clearly stated they don't want to get into the search business. Facebook users tend to use Google search. Facebook's ads business does not displace our advertising.''

The most memorable ad during Sunday's Super Bowl- Chrysler's two-minute spot featuring rap star Eminem- was a gut-wrenching decision for the carmaker's chief executive Sergio Marchionne . This was not an easy choice... apart from the money involved... and this is pretty expensive stuff, but you know, the choice of the topic, the choice of the characters in the thing were not easy choices. I had to think about this really long and hard, Sergio Marchionne said. Why? I asked him. ''You know, I love Eminem but... It was beautiful, and so moving, said Kirsten Gillibrand , who flew to Tucson with Barack Obama for an emotional memorial service Wednesday for the six who died in the shooting. spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Martin Luther King on Tuesday night. ''It was a huge lift off of me,'' Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . ''I can say it over and over again,'' Michael Vick said, but then when I say it to my agent, it's a totally different story.... So who knows what's going to happen? I have to follow his lead in that regard, and he's the expert in that field. Agents hate franchise tags more than anyone. They get paid a percentage of the contracts they negotiate.
